entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 23 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:13 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 1:13 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 1:13 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
